name: Knight And Mourning
description:
Knight And Mourning is a fast-paced, rage-inducing 2D platformer where you are on a mission to find your lost sword. Run, jump, dodge spikes, and suffer. Also, your family is dead.

FEATURES


  • A Level Editor
  • Over 90 Levels of pure pain! (There's 100, make sure to tell Justin)
  • 9+ worlds, each with a new mechanic! (each one will make you cry)
  • At least one NPC (are there more?)
  • A game mode that makes you question your sanity
  • Over 23 secrets! (there's 24, but don't tell Justin)
  • VERY speed-run-able! (if you don't like touching grass)
  • A story (I think, I can't remember)

If you don't think that the game is worth buying, look at what our definitely real, not fake customers have to say!

"I rate it 10/10 because I'm emotionally unstable." - Knight that is Mourning

"This game ate my pencil and kissed my rat. I rate it 11/10 because I have no life."
- Indecisive Knight

Buy it if you're still here!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2008820/Knight_And_Mourning/
